price: Nuhu akasema: Ewe Mola wangu Mlezi! Mimi najikinga kwako nisikuombe nisio na ujuzi nalo. Na kama hunisamehe na ukanirehemu, nitakuwa katika walio khasiri.
arabic: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّيٓ أَعُوذُ بِكَ أَنۡ أَسۡـَٔلَكَ مَا لَيۡسَ لِي بِهِۦ عِلۡمٞۖ وَإِلَّا تَغۡفِرۡ لِي وَتَرۡحَمۡنِيٓ أَكُن مِّنَ ٱلۡخَٰسِرِينَ
footnotes: Nuhu akasema: Ewe Muumba wangu, uliye tawala mambo yangu yote! Mimi nakuangukia Wewe. Sitakuomba nisicho kijua hakika yake. Nawe nisamehe kwa niliyo yasema kutokana na huruma zangu. Kama hukunipa fadhila ya msamaha wako, na ukanirehemu kwa rehema yako, nitakuwa katika makundi ya walio khasiri.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: qāla rabbi innī aʿūdhu bika an asalaka mā laysa lī bihi ʿil'mun wa-illā taghfir lī watarḥamnī akun mina al-khāsirīna
translations: and You have mercy on me
